A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worse than being a bad film\, it's a boring film. Plot lines go nowhere and the whole thing is a dull drudge. From the slowest ever space chase in history to an entirely superfluous section on some casino world\, this is a tedious bore of a film. New characters add nothing to the plot and the whole 'subversion of expectations' happens so frequently\, it's painful to watch unfold. Now that episode 9 is out\, the last jedi is even more of a painful waste of screen time and a terrible disappointment.
